name: A Rat's life after the CAT-aclysm
name_original: A Rat's life after the CAT-aclysm
description:
Relaxing, friendly game where 2 players do their best to slaughter each other while having a good laugh and avoiding exploding barrels, acid pools and radioactive cucumbers.
Gamepad game. Controls:
Left analog stick - movement control

Right analog stick - aims control

Left thrust - Movement ability

Right thrust - attack
